title: Greek Strategy/RPG Music Pack
description: 1 hour of music for your Ancient Greece-inspired strategy or RPG game!
longDescription:
Are you making a project inspired by Ancient Greece? I think I have what you need!


In this pack, you will find 16 Greek-inspired tracks which will suit your project perfectly. You will find 1 hour of traditional Greek instruments mixed-in with a retro sound and lush orchestras to help you build your game's ambiance. Listen to all of the tracks on SoundCloud!

I've included some bonus ambiances with solo instruments playing either original songs or ancient Greek songs such as an ancient Delphic hymn to Apollo, or Seikilos' Epitaph.


Files are available as both standard tracks or loops in WAV format, but you can shoot me an email if you need OGG, MP3, FLAC...I'll be happy to provide.


Tracklist:

1. Alpha (3:23)

2. Beta (3:25)

3. Delta (3:46)

4. Epsilon (3:23)

5. Eta (4:16)

6. Gamma (3:07)

7. Iota (3:02)

8. Kappa (2:53)

9. Ksi (3:46)

10. Lambda (2:48)

11. Mu (3:25)

12. Nu (3:11)

13. Omicron (3:43)

14. Pi (3:14, lol get it?)

15. Theta (3:00)

16. Zeta (3:51)

BONUS AMBIANCES (5x solo instruments)


Bring your game to the next level with a polished sound made with professionnal software and instruments!


Quick note: buying the pack grants you the right to use the music anywhere you'd like, forever, for either personal or commercial projects! No risk of being bothered with YouTube's algorithm too.
technicalDetails:

  • Â 16 tracks in either standard or loopable formats (WAV, other formats avaiable on-demand for free)

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Minutes of audio provided: approx. 1 hour

Supported Development Platforms: all
